text: Felanitx is on the east side of Majorca close to Porto Colom on the coast. It is from Palma. It is the centre of a very touristic area (there are more than 2.300 hotel rooms), especially in summer. There are 17,000 inhabitants. It is the home town of the famous painter Miquel Barcel√≥, who has just worked in the cathedral of Palma. == References == * http://www.idealspain.com/Pages/Places/mallorca/Felanitx.htm * http://www.info-mallorca.co.uk/felanitx/ Category:Mallorca Category:Municipalities in the Balearic Islands
title: Felanitx
